59f3b0128bf5501e050f3558.name: Unstable Matter
59f3b0128bf5501e050f3558.description: Zac's body erupts, damaging nearby enemies.
59f3b0128bf5501e050f3558.tooltip:
Zac's body erupts, dealing {{ e1 }} Magic Damage +{{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of the enemy's maximum Health as Magic Damage to all nearby enemies (Max: {{ e5 }} damage against minions and monsters).

When Zac reabsorbes a piece of himself, Unstable Matter's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }} second.

59f3b0118bf5501e050f3552.name: Arctic Assault
59f3b0118bf5501e050f3552.description: Charges forward, dealing magic damage and knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after knocking an enemy champion into the air.
59f3b0118bf5501e050f3552.tooltip: Charges forward, knocking enemies into the air and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The charge stops after knocking an enemy champion into the air.

59f3b0118bf5501e050f3555.name: Glacial Prison
59f3b0118bf5501e050f3555.description: Sejuani throws her True Ice bola in a line. If the bola hits an enemy champion, it shatters, stunning the target and nearby enemies. If the bola reaches its maximum range, it shatters and slows nearby enemies.
59f3b0118bf5501e050f3555.tooltip:
Sejuani throws her True Ice bola in a line. If the bola hits an enemy champion, it shatters, stunning the target and nearby enemies for {{ e2 }} seconds. If the bola reaches its maximum range, it shatters and slows enemies by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds instead.

All enemies in the shatter area take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

59f3b0118bf5501e050f3554.name: Permafrost
59f3b0118bf5501e050f3554.description: Abilities and basic attacks apply Frost to enemies. Activating Permafrost damages and slows all nearby enemies with Frost.
59f3b0118bf5501e050f3554.tooltip:
Passive: Abilities and basic attacks apply Frost to enemies for 4 seconds.

Active: All nearby enemies with Frost take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3b0128bf5501e050f355a.name: Let's Bounce!
59f3b0128bf5501e050f355a.description: Zac launches into the air, gaining Movement Speed, and slams down three times, each time damaging, slowing and knocking up nearby enemies.
59f3b0128bf5501e050f355a.tooltip:
Zac bounces 4 times, knocking up and slowing enemies.
Each bounce deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to nearby enemies, knocks them up for {{ e7 }} second, and slows them by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e0 }} second. Enemies hit more than once take {{ e2 }}% damage and are not knocked up. Upon activation, Zac removes all slows affecting him and gains an accelerating Movement Speed buff ({{ e3 }}-{{ e4 }}%) for the duration.

Zac can right-click to move and can activate Unstable Matter while in the air.

59f3b0108bf5501e050f354a.name: Righteous Fury
59f3b0108bf5501e050f354a.description: Passive: Grants Kayle on Hit magic Damage.  Activate: Ignite Kayle's sword with a holy flame, granting Kayle a ranged attack that damages multiple enemies and deals bonus magic damage.
59f3b0108bf5501e050f354a.tooltip:
Passive: Kayle's Basic Attacks deal an additional {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on hit.

Active: Kayle increases her Attack Range by 400 for 10 seconds and the passive bonus is increased to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on hit.

In addition, enemies near her target take {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on attack.

59f3b0108bf5501e050f354b.name: Arcane Smash
59f3b0108bf5501e050f354b.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
59f3b0108bf5501e050f354b.tooltip: Maokai releases an arcane shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked back and all affected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3b0108bf5501e050f354f.name: Flame Chompers!
59f3b0108bf5501e050f354f.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
59f3b0108bf5501e050f354f.tooltip: Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that, once armed, explode on contact with enemy champions, rooting the target for 1.5 seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 1.5 seconds to nearby enemies. Chompers last for 5 seconds.

59f3b0128bf5501e050f3559.name: Elastic Slingshot
59f3b0128bf5501e050f3559.description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
59f3b0128bf5501e050f3559.tooltip:
Charges up and launches towards a target area, knocking up enemies.
Zac faces the cursor and charges up over {{ e4 }} seconds. Reactivating the ability launches him towards his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to all enemies hit and knocking them back for {{ e5 }} second.

In addition, Zac will spawn extra chunks if he hits multiple enemy champions.

Can be cancelled by moving, refunding half of the ability's cooldown and cost.

59f3b0128bf5501e050f3557.name: Stretching Strike
59f3b0128bf5501e050f3557.description: Zac extends his arms, slowing and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
59f3b0128bf5501e050f3557.tooltip: Smacks enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3b0118bf5501e050f3553.name: Flail of the Northern Winds
59f3b0118bf5501e050f3553.description: Sejuani's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage to the target and enemies near it. She then spins her flail, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
59f3b0118bf5501e050f3553.tooltip:
Sejuani's next basic attack also affects enemies near her target. All affected units are dealt magic damage equal to {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of their own maximum Health. Sejuani then swings her flail, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies over 4 seconds.

If this ability is reactivated, Sejuani immediately starts swinging her flail.

59f3b0108bf5501e050f354c.name: Twisted Advance
59f3b0108bf5501e050f354c.description: Maokai dissolves into a cloud of arcane energies. He regrows near a target enemy, dealing damage and rooting it in place.
59f3b0108bf5501e050f354c.tooltip: Maokai transforms into a cloud of arcane energy that quickly travels to a target enemy, roots it for {{ e2 }} second(s) and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of the target's maximum health as magic damage (Max: {{ e3 }} to minions and monsters).

59f3b0108bf5501e050f3551.name: Vorpal Spikes
59f3b0108bf5501e050f3551.description: Cho'Gath's attacks passively release deadly spikes, dealing damage to all enemy units in front of him.
59f3b0108bf5501e050f3551.tooltip: Toggle: Basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks.

59f3b0128bf5501e050f3556.name: Despair
59f3b0128bf5501e050f3556.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second.
59f3b0128bf5501e050f3556.tooltip: Toggle: Amumu cries, refreshing Curses on nearby enemies and dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ charabilitypower*2 }})% of their maximum health each second.

59f3b0108bf5501e050f354d.name: Sapling Toss
59f3b0108bf5501e050f354d.description: Maokai flings a sapling that wards the nearby area. When enemies approach, the sapling attacks enemies with an arcane blast.
59f3b0108bf5501e050f354d.tooltip: Maokai flings a sapling to target area. The sapling wards the nearby area, and will chase enemies that approach, exploding to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slow enemies hit by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e3 }} second(s). Saplings last for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3b0108bf5501e050f354e.name: Vengeful Maelstrom
59f3b0108bf5501e050f354e.description: Maokai shields his allies by drawing power from hostile spells and attacks, reducing non-tower damage done to allied champions in the area. When Maokai ends the effect, he unleashes the absorbed energy to deal damage to enemies within the vortex.
59f3b0108bf5501e050f354e.tooltip:
Toggle: Maokai surrounds himself with a magical vortex that protects him and allied champions by reducing damage from non-turret sources by {{ e1 }}% for up to {{ e2 }} seconds.

Maokai can end the effect to release the stored energy, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+2 per damage absorbed) magic damage to enemies within the vortex. Maokai can store up to {{ e5 }} bonus damage.

59f3b0108bf5501e050f3550.name: Broken Wings
59f3b0108bf5501e050f3550.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
59f3b0108bf5501e050f3550.tooltip:
Riven strikes out in front of her in a short line. This ability may be reactivated {{ e4 }} additional times.

1st and 2nd Use: Slashes forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all units she comes in contact with.
3rd Use: Leaps forward and slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocking nearby enemies up. This leap can cross unpathable terrain.

Riven will target the unit your cursor is hovering over, or if no targets are present, Riven will simply strike the direction she is currently facing.

59f3b0368bf5501e050f3800.name: Frost
59f3b0368bf5501e050f3800.description: Damaging an enemy with an ability or basic attack grants Sejuani bonus Armor and reduces movement-slowing effects on her.

59f3b0368bf5501e050f37ff.name: Sap Magic
59f3b0368bf5501e050f37ff.description: Each time a spell is cast near Maokai he draws energy from it, gaining a charge of Magical Sap. When Maokai has 5 charges his next basic attack heals him for a percentage of his max Health.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2be3.name: Sterak's Gage
59f3af908bf5501e050f2be3.description:
+400 Health
+25% Base Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive - Lifeline: Upon taking at least 400 to 1800 damage (based on level) within 5 seconds, gain a rapidly decaying Shield for 30% of your maximum Health for 8 seconds (60 second cooldown).

Sterak's Fury: When Lifeline triggers, grow in size and strength, gaining +25% additional Base Attack Damage.

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc6.name: Eye of the Watchers
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc6.description:
+200 Health
+100% Base Mana Regen
+25 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Spells and basic attacks against champions or buildings deal 15 additional damage and grant 15 Gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 4 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

(A player may only have 3 Stealth Wards on the map at one time. Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc1.name: Zeal
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc1.description:
+15% Attack Speed
+20% Critical Strike Chance

UNIQUE Passive: +5% Movement Speed

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc4.name: Eye of the Equinox
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc4.description:
+500 Health
+200% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 320 (+20 per level) Health. Killing a minion heals the owner and the nearest allied champion for 50 Health and grants them kill Gold. These effects require a nearby ally. Recharges every 30 seconds. Max 4 charges.
UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 4 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

(A player may only have 3 Stealth Wards on the map at one time. Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc7.name: Frost Queen's Claim
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc7.description:
+50 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds
+75% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Spells and basic attacks against champions or buildings deal 15 additional damage and grant 15 Gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
UNIQUE Active: Summon 2 icy ghosts for 6 seconds that seek out nearby enemy champions. Ghosts reveal enemies on contact and reduce their Movement Speed by 40% for between 2 and 5 seconds based on how far the ghosts have traveled (90 second cooldown).

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2bd7.name: Randuin's Omen
59f3af908bf5501e050f2bd7.description:
+500 Health
+60 Armor
-10% Damage taken from Critical Strikes

UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 15% (1 second duration).
UNIQUE Active: Slows the Movement Speed of nearby enemy units by 35% for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown).

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc0.name: Statikk Shiv
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc0.description:
+35% Attack Speed
+30% Critical Strike Chance
+5% Movement Speed

Passive: Moving and attacking will make an attack Energized.

UNIQUE Passive - Shiv Lightning: Your Energized attacks deal 50~120 bonus magic damage (based on level) to up to 5 targets on hit (deals +120% bonus damage to minions and can critically strike).

59f3af908bf5501e050f2be1.name: Enchantment: Cinderhulk
59f3af908bf5501e050f2be1.description:
+400 Health
+15% Bonus Health

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 7 (+2 per champion level) magic damage a second to nearby enemies while in combat. Deals 100% bonus damage to monsters.

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc2.name: Runaan's Hurricane
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc2.description:
+40% Attack Speed
+30% Critical Strike Chance
+7% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Wind's Fury: When basic attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target, each dealing (25% of Attack Damage) physical damage. Bolts can critically strike and apply on hit effects.
UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal an additional 15 physical damage on hit.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2bdc.name: Infinity Edge
59f3af908bf5501e050f2bdc.description:
+70 Attack Damage
+20% Critical Strike Chance

UNIQUE Passive: Critical strike bonus damage is increased by 50%.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2be5.name: Spirit Visage
59f3af908bf5501e050f2be5.description:
+500 Health
+55 Magic Resist
+200% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Increases all healing received by 25%.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2be0.name: Phantom Dancer
59f3af908bf5501e050f2be0.description:
+45% Attack Speed
+30% Critical Strike Chance
+5% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Spectral Waltz: While within 550 units of an enemy champion you can see, +7% Movement Speed and you can move through units.
UNIQUE Passive - Lament: The last champion hit deals 12% less damage to you (ends after 10 seconds of not hitting).

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bd5.name: Abyssal Scepter
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bd5.description:
+60 Ability Power
+60 Magic Resist
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Aura: Nearby enemy champions take 10% more magic damage.

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bd1.name: Mikael's Crucible
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bd1.description:
+40 Magic Resist
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+100% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: +20% Heal and Shield Power
UNIQUE Passive - Harmony: Grants bonus % Base Health Regen equal to your bonus % Base Mana Regen.
UNIQUE Active: Cleanses all stuns, roots, taunts, fears, silences, and slows on an allied champion and grants them slow immunity for 2 seconds (120 second cooldown).

Successfully cleansing an effect this way grants the ally 40% movement speed for 2 seconds.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2be6.name: The Black Cleaver
59f3af908bf5501e050f2be6.description:
+400 Health
+40 Attack Damage
+20% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing their Armor by 5% for 6 seconds (stacks up to 6 times, up to 30%).
UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Dealing physical damage grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant 60 movement speed for 2 seconds instead. This Movement Speed is halved for ranged champions.

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bce.name: Relic Shield
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bce.description:
+75 Health
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 195 (+5 per level) Health. Killing a minion heals the owner and the nearest allied champion for 15 Health and grants them kill Gold.

These effects require a nearby ally. Recharges every 40 seconds. Max 2 charges.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bcd.name: Spellthief's Edge
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bcd.description:
+5 Ability Power
+2 Gold per 10 seconds
+25% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Spells and basic attacks against champions or buildings deal 10 additional damage and grant 8 Gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds. Killing a minion disables this passive for 12 seconds.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2be2.name: Lord Dominik's Regards
59f3af908bf5501e050f2be2.description:
+50 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive - Giant Slayer: Grants up to +15% physical damage against enemy champions with greater maximum Health than you (+1.5% damage per 100 Health difference, maxing at 1000 Health difference).
UNIQUE Passive - Last Whisper: +45% Bonus Armor Penetration

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bcf.name: Ancient Coin
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bcf.description:
+25% Base Mana Regen
+5% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Being near a minion's death without dealing the killing blow grants 4 Gold and 5 Health.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

''Gold dust rises from the desert and clings to the coin.'' - Historian Shurelya, 11 November, 23 CLE

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bcc.name: Face of the Mountain
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bcc.description:
+450 Health
+100% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 320 (+20 per level) Health. Killing a minion heals the owner and the nearest allied champion for 50 Health and grants them kill Gold. These effects require a nearby ally. Recharges every 30 seconds. Max 4 charges.
UNIQUE Active: Grant a shield to you and an ally equal to 10% of your maximum Health for 4 seconds. After 4 seconds, the shields explode to slow nearby enemies by 40% for 2 seconds (60 second cooldown). Automatically targets the most wounded ally if cast upon self.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bd4.name: Banshee's Veil
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bd4.description:
+300 Health
+70 Magic Resist
+100% Base Health Regeneration

UNIQUE Passive: Grants a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability. This shield refreshes after no damage is taken from enemy champions for 40 seconds.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2be8.name: The Bloodthirster
59f3af908bf5501e050f2be8.description:
+75 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: +20% Life Steal
UNIQUE Passive: Your basic attacks can now overheal you. Excess life is stored as a shield that can block 50-350 damage, based on champion level.

This shield decays slowly if you haven't dealt or taken damage in the last 25 seconds.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2bdf.name: Enchantment: Cinderhulk
59f3af908bf5501e050f2bdf.description:
+400 Health
+15% Bonus Health

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 7 (+2 per champion level) magic damage a second to nearby enemies while in combat. Deals 100% bonus damage to monsters.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2bea.name: Dead Man's Plate
59f3af908bf5501e050f2bea.description:
+500 Health
+50 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Dreadnought: While moving, build stacks of Momentum, increasing movement speed by up to 60 at 100 stacks. Momentum quickly decays while under the effects of a stun, taunt, fear, polymorph, or immobilize effect, and slowly decays while slowed.
UNIQUE Passive - Crushing Blow: Basic attacks discharge all Momentum, dealing 1 physical damage per 2 stacks. If 100 stacks are discharged, damage is doubled and the target is slowed by 50% decaying over 1 second (melee only).

''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bd0.name: Spectre's Cowl
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bd0.description:
+250 Health
+30 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive: Grants 150% Base Health Regen for up to 10 seconds after taking damage from an enemy champion.

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc5.name: Eye of the Oasis
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc5.description:
+200 Health
+100% Base Health Regen
+100% Base Mana Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Being near a minion's death without dealing the killing blow grants 6 Gold and 10 Health.
UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 4 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

(A player may only have 3 Stealth Wards on the map at one time. Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

59f3af908bf5501e050f2be4.name: Sunfire Cape
59f3af908bf5501e050f2be4.description:
+500 Health
+50 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 25 (+1 per champion level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies. Deals 50% bonus damage to minions and monsters.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2be7.name: Ravenous Hydra
59f3af908bf5501e050f2be7.description:
+75 Attack Damage
+100% Base Health Regen
+12% Life Steal

Passive: 50% of total Life Steal applies to damage dealt by this item.
UNIQUE Passive - Cleave: Basic attacks deal 20% to 60% of total Attack Damage as bonus physical damage to enemies near the target on hit (enemies closest to the target take the most damage).
UNIQUE Active - Crescent: Deals 60% to 100% of total Attack Damage as physical damage to nearby enemy units (closest enemies take the most damage) (10 second cooldown).

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc8.name: Frostfang
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc8.description:
+15 Ability Power
+2 Gold per 10 seconds
+75% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Spells and basic attacks against champions or buildings deal 15 additional damage and grant 15 Gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds. Killing a minion disables this passive for 12 seconds.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2bdb.name: Blade of the Ruined King
59f3af908bf5501e050f2bdb.description:
+40 Attack Damage
+25% Attack Speed
+15% Life Steal

UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 8% of the target's current Health in bonus physical damage (max 60 vs. monsters and minions) on hit. Life Steal applies to this damage.
UNIQUE Active: Deals 100 magic damage to target champion and steals 25% of their Movement Speed for 3 seconds (90 second cooldown).

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bd3.name: Kircheis Shard
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bd3.description:
+15% Attack Speed

Passive: Moving and attacking will make an attack Energized.

UNIQUE Passive - Energized Strike: Your Energized attacks deal 40 bonus magic damage on hit.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2bd9.name: Last Whisper
59f3af908bf5501e050f2bd9.description:
+10 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive - Last Whisper: +45% Bonus Armor Penetration

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bd6.name: Poacher's Dirk
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bd6.description:
+15 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: +20 Movement Speed out of Combat
UNIQUE Passive: After poaching 3 large monsters from the enemy jungle (60 second cooldown), transforms into a Serrated Dirk.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2bd8.name: Death's Dance
59f3af908bf5501e050f2bd8.description:
+75 Attack Damage
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage heals for 15% of the damage dealt. This is 33% as effective for Area of Effect damage.
UNIQUE Passive: 15% of damage taken is dealt as a Bleed effect over 3 seconds instead.

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bca.name: Nomad's Medallion
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bca.description:
+25% Base Health Regen
+75% Base Mana Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Being near a minion's death without dealing the killing blow grants 6 Gold and 10 Health.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

''The medallion shines with the glory of a thousand voices when exposed to the sun.'' - Historian Shurelya, 22 June, 24 CLE

59f3af908bf5501e050f2bde.name: Guardian Angel
59f3af908bf5501e050f2bde.description:
+60 Armor
+45 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive: Upon taking lethal damage, restores the greater of 700 Health or 30% of maximum Health and 30% of maximum Mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300 second cooldown).

59f3af908bf5501e050f2beb.name: Essence Reaver
59f3af908bf5501e050f2beb.description:
+70 Attack Damage
+20% Critical Strike Chance

UNIQUE Passive: +10% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive: Gain increasingly more Cooldown Reduction from Critical Strike Chance provided by other sources (maximum +20% additional Cooldown Reduction at 30% Critical Strike Chance).
UNIQUE Passive: Critical strikes restore 3% of your maximum Mana pool.

59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc9.name: Targon's Brace
59f3af8f8bf5501e050f2bc9.description:
+175 Health
+50% Base Health Regen
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 200 (+10 per level) Health. Killing a minion heals the owner and the nearest allied champion for 40 Health and grants them kill Gold.

These effects require a nearby ally. Recharges every 30 seconds. Max 3 charges.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

59f3af908bf5501e050f2be9.name: Talisman of Ascension
59f3af908bf5501e050f2be9.description:
+45 Armor
+150% Base Health Regen
+75% Base Mana Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive - Point Runner: Builds up to +20% Movement Speed over 2 seconds while near turrets, fallen turrets and Void Gates.
